#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Player.

== Name ==

[CPlayer Player]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Player (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Type used to record all information about a golfer: Identification, equipment, rounds played,
			statistics.
			A player has a mandatory gender attribute.
			The name and date-of-birth elements are mendatory as the are part of the primary key.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `gender`=[SGender Gender]>
            ( name, date-of-birth, [CPlayerHandicap current-handicap]?, [CAddress address]`*`, [CContact contact]`*`, [CCountryClubChoice home-country-club]?, [CNote note]?, [CMedia media]?, [CEquipmentList equipment-list]?, [CGolfBag golf-bag]`*`, [CRound round]`*`, [CStatistics statistics]`*`   )
  </...>
----
  		      
=== Attributes ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* || *Use* || *Default* || *Fixed* || *Form* ||
|| gender ||  Gender of the player || [SGender golfml:Gender] || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||
